text: Mbiru imwe neimwe yaiva yakareba makubhiti gumi namasere25:17 mamita angaita 8.2 . Musoro wendarira waiva pamusoro pembiru wakanga wakareba makubhiti matatu25:17 mamita angaita 1.4 uye wakanga wakashongedzwa nomumbure uye namatamba endarira akanga akaupoteredza. Imwe mbiru nomumbure wayo yakanga yakadarowo.
